name: Heart Attack Predictor Web App
desc: Developed a Heart Attack Predictor web application aimed at assessing the risk of heart attacks based on user input of key health metrics.

name: Amazon Review Sentiment Analysis Model
desc: This project focuses on sentiment analysis of Amazon reviews using the RoBERTa pretrained model,the project aims to extract insights from customer feedback on Amazon.

name: Amazon Reviews Sentiment Analyzer
desc: Sentiment analysis tool to classify reviews as positive, negative, or neutral, and provides a visual representation of the sentiment distribution.

name: Titanic Classification Model
desc: The Titanic Classification project uses machine learning's Logistic regression algorithm to predict a person's likelihood of survival in the event of a sinking.

name: Stock Price Prediction Model
desc: Developed a machine learning model for stock prediction using advanced algorithms and historical market data to forecast future stock prices.

name: AI Voice Assistant
desc: Mihir A.I, a Python-based voice assistant that leverages Google Cloud Speech-to-Text for precise command interpretation and OpenAI's GPT-3 for intelligent responses.

name: URL Shortner
desc: Crafted a URL shortener using Python Flask, providing concise and user-friendly shortened links for efficient web navigation.

name: Madha Ecommerce Sales Dashboard
desc: The dashboard provides comprehensive insights into sales performance, customer behavior, and other key metrics to help drive business decisions.

name: Rubik Cube
desc: It allows users to interact with a 3x3x3 Rubik Cube, track their solving time, and keep records of their solving statistics.

name: Stick Hero Game
desc: The game involves extending a stick to reach the platforms and land safely to score points.

name: Ball Tracker
desc: This project involves tracking balls of different colors (Blue, Green, and Red) in a video, recording their entry events into different quadrants, and generating an output video.

name: Python Complete Guide
desc: Welcome to the Python Complete Guide repository. This repository contains a comprehensive collection of Python tutorials and implementations.

name: Data Science Complete Guide
desc: Welcome to the Data Science Guide Repository! This repository contains comprehensive resources and examples to help you learn Data Science concepts.

name: 3D Portfolio
desc: Tempting 3D portfolio created using Html, CSS, Javascript, React,js, Vite.js and Vue.js

name: Hospital Management System
desc: Implemented a comprehensive hospital management system using Java and MySQL, streamlining administrative tasks and enhancing patient care.

name: Java Complete Guide
desc: Welcome to the Java Complete Guide Repository! This repository contains comprehensive resources and examples to help you learn Java programming from the basics to advanced topics.

name: Library Management System
desc: Designed a library management system using SQL, facilitating organized cataloging, tracking, and management of library resources for seamless user experience
